DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy and safety of SPD503(guanfacine hydrochloride) in subjects with ADHD and oppositional symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: SPD503 (Guanfacine Hydrochloride) in ADHD Plus Oppositional Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects with ADHD and oppositional symptoms ADHDRS>=24 CGI >=4 Tscore of Opp subscale CPRSR:L >=65 Normal ECG and BP >= 55 lbs
